SCTX:
Begin giantScript

short doOnce
short onfire
short hasspell

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_WildHunt > 82 )
	return
endif

if ( GetEffect sEffectFireDamage == 0 )
	if ( onfire == 1 )
		set onfire to 0
	endif
elseif ( GetEffect sEffectFireDamage == 1 )
	if ( onfire == 0 )
		set onfire to 1
	endif
endif

if ( onfire == 1 )
	if ( hasspell == 1 )
		RemoveSpell "BM_fireregen"
		set hasspell to 0
	endif
elseif ( onfire == 0 )
	if ( hasspell == 0 )
		AddSpell "BM_fireregen"
		set hasspell to 1
	endif
endif
	
if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player <= 1028 )
		Journal BM_WildHunt 80
		set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_WildHunt < 82 )
		Journal BM_WildHunt 82
	endif
endif

End giantScript
